thread.section_title: First Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: safe and reasonable
thread.title_full: safe and reasonable - Review of First Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: grngrl2001
title: safe and reasonable
text: I stayed one night as part of a package purchased via last minute.com. it was clean and updated. has elevator. right across street to a metro station. cafe and tAkeout places nearby. I had view of Eiffel tower. toilet and shower in room. everything supplied. nice decor. had tv. small room but that's okay since when in Paris you aren't in room much but to sleep. quiet for a city hotel. hallway a little dark but other than that I haven't a complaint. check in was quick and front desk spoke English. provided map and assistance on how metro worked. great stay for fair price.
